com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites

Class SpriteWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.Sprite
      • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.SpriteWrapper

  • public abstract class SpriteWrapper
extends Sprite
    Class wrapping several sprites that are intended to be treated as the same sprite.
    Author:
    jlreyes

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSprite(Sprite sprite)
      Same as addSprites(new Sprite[] {sprite}).
      void addSprites(Sprite[] sprites)
      Adds the given sprites to this SpriteWrapper to handle.
      Sprite[] getSprites() 
      Renderable onEndLogicStep(java.lang.Thread thread)
      MUST BE CALLED AT END OF EVERY LOGIC STEP.
      void onStartLogicStep()
      Grabs a free renderable for the logic step.
      void setAngle(float angle)
      Does the same as Sprite.setAngle(float) except that this also rotates every sprite contained by this SpriteWrapper.
      void setLocation(float v1, float v2)
      Does the same as Sprite.setLocation(float, float) except that this also translates every sprite contained by this SpriteWrapper.
      void setScale(float scale)
      Does the same as Sprite.setScale(float) except that this also scales every sprite contained by this SpriteWrapper.
      void update(long deltaTime)
      Step this character by deltaTime.

      • SpriteWrapper

        public SpriteWrapper(java.lang.String name,
             SpriteWrapper wrapper,
             boolean isMovable)
        Same as SpriteWrapper(name, SpriteWrapper, boolean, Sprite.DEFAULT_X, Sprite.DEFAULT_Y, Sprite.DEFAULT_SCALE, Sprite.DEFAULT_ANGLE)

      • SpriteWrapper

        public SpriteWrapper(java.lang.String name,
             SpriteWrapper wrapper,
             boolean isMoveable,
             float startX,
             float startY,
             float startScale,
             float startAngle)
        Creates a new SpriteWrapper.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this wrapper.
        wrapper - The wrapper containing this wrapper.
        isMoveable - True iff this sprite will ever from its starting position, scale, or angle.
        startX - The starting x coordinate of this wrapper.
        startY - The starting y coordinate of this wrapper.
        startScale - The starting scale of this wrapper.
        startAngle - the starting angle of this wrapper.

      • SpriteWrapper

        public SpriteWrapper(java.lang.String name,
             Layer layer,
             boolean isMoveable)
        Same as SpriteWrapper(name, layer, boolean, Sprite.DEFAULT_X, Sprite.DEFAULT_Y, Sprite.DEFAULT_SCALE, Sprite.DEFAULT_ANGLE)

      • SpriteWrapper

        public SpriteWrapper(java.lang.String name,
             Layer layer,
             boolean isMoveable,
             float startX,
             float startY,
             float startScale,
             float startAngle)
        Creates a new SpriteWrapper.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this wrapper.
        layer - The layer containing this wrapper
        isMoveable - True iff this sprite will ever from its starting position, scale, or angle.
        startX - The starting x coordinate of this wrapper.
        startY - The starting y coordinate of this wrapper.
        startScale - The starting scale of this wrapper.
        startAngle - the starting angle of this wrapper.

    • Method Detail

      • addSprite

        public void addSprite(Sprite sprite)
        Same as addSprites(new Sprite[] {sprite}).

      • addSprites

        public void addSprites(Sprite[] sprites)
        Adds the given sprites to this SpriteWrapper to handle. O(n), this should not be called dynamically.

      • onStartLogicStep

        public void onStartLogicStep()
        Description copied from class: Sprite
        Grabs a free renderable for the logic step. MUST BE CALLED AT THE BEGINNING OF EVERY LOGIC STEP.
        Overrides:
        onStartLogicStep in class Sprite

      • update

        public void update(long deltaTime)
        Description copied from class: Sprite
        Step this character by deltaTime.
        Specified by:
        update in class Sprite

      • onEndLogicStep

        public Renderable onEndLogicStep(java.lang.Thread thread)
        Description copied from class: Sprite
        MUST BE CALLED AT END OF EVERY LOGIC STEP. Updates the active renderable and then sets it to null.
        Overrides:
        onEndLogicStep in class Sprite
        Returns:
        The renderable passed.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(float v1,
               float v2)
        Does the same as Sprite.setLocation(float, float) except that this also translates every sprite contained by this SpriteWrapper.
        Overrides:
        setLocation in class Sprite

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float scale)
        Does the same as Sprite.setScale(float) except that this also scales every sprite contained by this SpriteWrapper.

        setScale in class Sprite
